Last week I celebrated 10 Years of working with John Adams¬†at The Score: Marketing, Production, Promotion. Although there were some breaks where I did not work regularly, it has been an incredible 10 years of growth and learning for me. John continually took chances on me - from hiring me initially as a high school senior, to inviting me to move with him to central California after graduation, to trusting me to run my own home office and continue working long-distance. My career path and overall path in life would never be where it is now if not for John and my time working for The Score; he was my gateway into the sports entertainment industry and for that, I owe him everything. He is a great boss, mentor, role-model, and friend.

summary: Since 1991, Skyline has set a standard to provide quality video services for our clients. We offer a variety of services at affordable rates. From Arizona to anywhere in the World, we offer our clients flexibility, creativity, affordability and dependability. Our production team has both the technical experience and artistic capabilities to make your next project a success.Specialties: Full service video production company with the ability to shoot on site or in a studio.  From concept to completion, we can handle your needs.
